info.title: Create an invite controlled space where you feel at home
info.text: Discord servers are organized into channels with topics for you to collaborate, share, or simply talk about your day without clogging up a general chat

info.title: It's easy to meet up here
info.text: Hop into a voice channel when you're free. Friends on the same server can see you and join the channel without an invite

info.title: For a few or a crowd
info.text: Organize any community with moderation tools and personalized member access. Give special powers to members, create private channels, and more
